isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - TIMING GEAR TRAIN AND FRONT COVER - FRONT COVER - COMPONENT CHANGES

svcsubproc.title: Crankcase Front Cover
svcsubproc.para:
Effective with S/N 567492 (1989 Model Year) the crankcase front cover has an increased sized water pump by-pass hose inlet. Refer to Figure 8.6
for dimensions. Refer to current parts catalog when replacing the front cover or by-pass hose.

figure.caption: Figure 8.6. Crankcase Water Pump By-Pass Inlet Location.

svcsubproc.title: Front Cover Plate
svcsubproc.para:
Effective with S/N 567492 (1989 Model Year) the front cover plate and gasket have been decreased in size to accept the new direct crankcase mounting front engine support. Refer to Figure 8.7
for current layout.

svcsubproc.title: Front Cover Plate Gasket & Front Cover Gasket
svcsubproc.para: Effective with S/N 614866 and Above. The front cover plate gasket P/N 1 815 482 C1 and front cover gasket P/N 1 815 483 C1 have been decreased in size. It is no longer necessary to cut the lengths of the gasket during reassembly, eliminating the chance of torn gaskets or gasket debris entering the engine.

figure.caption: Figure 8.7. Front Cover Plate and Cover Plate Gasket Comparison.
